post.description: Creates a batch of notifications, saves them to the database in a single transaction, and broadcasts each one to relevant online users. The input should be a JSON array of notification objects.
post.summary: Create one or more new notifications

parameters.name: notifications

500.description: Internal server error (e.g., database transaction failure)

get.description: Establishes a WebSocket connection. The client must send a JSON message with `orgId` and `username` to register the session.

put.description: Updates the content of a specific notification by its ID.
